snippet: The publishing company is seeking film and television profits from articles that may become films and television programs, a plan that writers and agents say cuts into their shrinking compensation.
abstract: Conde Nast issues new writer contracts that will bring the publisher a greater share of film and television profits from articles that are turned into films and television programs; writers and agents say plan cuts into their already shrinking compensation.
lead_paragraph: The publishing company is seeking film and television profits from articles that may become films and television programs, a plan that writers and agents say cuts into their shrinking compensation.

headline.seo: Condé Nast Contracts Cut Author’s Share in Film Deals
headline.main: Condé Nast Writer Deals Stir Dispute
headline.print_headline: Condé Nast Writer Deals Stir Dispute
